The video was published on Facebook on F: 2020, and has been viewed more than 200 times.
The post: s caption in simplified Chinese translates to English as "An explosion at Jiaxingyuan on Gutian 4th Road, Wuhan, was caused by the use of air conditioner at an apartment thoroughly disinfected by alcohol. Be warned, be warned."
